entry.content:
New floors, Large living space, 2 closets, Laundry on-site, New building, Video intercom, New appliances.
Close to the 86th Street #4,5,6 Subway lines as well as the 2nd Avenue Subway Q Train. Convenient to 86th Street for the #4, 5 & trains, Whole Foods, and Fairway Supermarket. Other desirable amenities also include Equinox Gym, Soul Cycle, The Penrose, Shake Shack, The Meatball Shop, The Comic Strip and H&H Bagels.

Contact me to view this home or any other on this website / I have access to any and every listing in Manhattan.
